00030 /* Stable headers which will be used for precompilation if the compiler
00031    supports it. Add entries here when headers are unlikely to change.
00032    NB: a change to any of these headers will result in a full rebuild,
00033    so don't add things to this lightly.
00034 */
00035

00037 #define __OgreStableHeaders__
